revision.text: A '''key''' is an [[inventory]] [[actor]] derived from {{Class|Key}}. Keys have a few specific properties: *They are generally displayed on the [[HUD]] *The [[automap]] can represent them with a different [[map arrow]] when using the map [[cheat]]. *Keys are given lock values in the [[LOCKDEFS]] lump. *Several [[cheat code]]s and the <tt>give keys</tt> [[console command]] can be used to acquire all keys. {{doomwiki}}[[Category:Glossary]]
